Articles.Content: Are there any mods with the blue origin ship(s) ?  Can only find SpaceX, but nothing on BO except an engine.

I haven't seen any yet, no. But I suspect that may change sooner or later, now that BO has landed a booster and is in the news. Modders tend to make what's exciting to them, and so far BO has been a pretty quiet entry in terms of space news, until now.

12 hours ago, NecroBones said:

I haven't seen any yet, no. But I suspect that may change sooner or later, now that BO has landed a booster and is in the news. Modders tend to make what's exciting to them, and so far BO has been a pretty quiet entry in terms of space news, until now.

 

I completely agree.  I think one of the biggest things is what is useful to us.  RoverDude says that a lot.  I'll consider it.  BTW, this should be in Add on discussions or whatever they changed the name to.
